posts.message: It is with the greatest of pleasure that the team can officially announce the return of Project Euler. The current website will go offline for a short period on Saturday 16 August 2014 at approximately 9am [BST] to restore full functionality.
posts.caption: projecteuler.net
posts.description: As many of you will be aware it was discovered on Sunday 15 June 2014 that Project Euler had been hacked. An immediate decision was made by the team to take the website offline and to make everyone aware, through the temporary front page, that we had reason to believe that the database had been comp…

posts.message: I am working on a javascript intensive project that I wanted to wrap in a webview to "app"itize it but I was disappointed by the poorly performing android WebView ,  Crosswalk is a web runtime built around Chromium which gave me the performance I needed for my app. I am still discovering it but I thought I'd share it with you guys.
posts.caption: crosswalk-project.org
posts.description: Crosswalk is a web runtime for ambitious HTML5 applications. It provides all the features of a modern browser, combined with deep device integration and an API for adding native extensions. It is especially suited to mobile devices, with support for both Android and Tizen.
